features: One 5-piece pack of BIC Flex 4 Refillable Razors for Men contains one handle and four cartridges
Men's razors with four ultra-thin flexible blades that are durable and long-lasting* -- the ideal face razors *vs. BIC Sensitive
Designed for sensitive skin, the BIC razors for men feature a lubricating strip enriched with aloe and vitamin E for enhanced glide

Great mens disposable razors for face, head and body use
body.description: Experience a razor designed for sensitive skin with BIC Flex 4 Refillable Men’s Razors. Bring home a dependable 5-piece razor kit for men that contains one handle and four cartridges. Featuring four ultra-thin flexible blades, the BIC Flex 4 Refillable shaving razors for men offer durability and longer-lasting* use. Each razor has a lubricating strip enriched with aloe and vitamin E for enhanced glide. For improved control, the BIC Flex 4 mens razors for shaving have a 30-degree pivoting head that moves with the contours of your skin and an ergonomic handle with an anti-slip grip. The BIC Flex 4 refillable razors are great shavers for face, head and body use. As an added bonus, the slim design easily fits into toiletry kits, so you’re ready for quick grooming wherever, whenever you need it. When you’ve used all of the razors, simply purchase a new pack for a fresh handle and refills. Get a comfortable, yet affordable shave when you choose BIC Flex 4 Refillable Razors. *Vs. BIC Sensitive.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Convenient 4-Blade Razor for a Smoother, Closer Shave Four Long-Lasting, Contour-Adjusting Blades Equipped with four flexible blades that individually adjust to the contours of your face, jaw, and neck, this razor delivers a closer shave that leaves your skin feeling ultra-smooth. The razor has a lubricating strip enriched with aloe and vitamin E enhances the glide. Ergonomic Handle for Superior Control The Flex 4 Refillable Disposable Razor features an ergonomic, anti-slip handle with textured grip for superior control, while the razor head pivots and adjusts to your movements as you shave. Replaceable Cartridges for Added Convenience Having additional cartridges on hand is great for weekends away or business travel. Switching out a used cartridge is easy: Simply press the button to release the cartridge and dispose of it in the trash. Click in the new cartridge with the lubricating strip at the top. (Additional cartridge refills not sold separately.)

Flex 5 Refillable Flex 5 Flex 4 Sensitive Refillable Flex 4 Sensitive Flex 3 Refillable Flex 3 Contour-Adjusting Blade Count 5 5 4 4 3 3 Longer Lasting Flexible Blades ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Titanium Ultra-Thin Blades ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-Slip Grip ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Pivoting Head ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Lubrication Strip Enriched with Aloe ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Precision Edging Blade ✓ ✓ Fresh New Handle + Refills Included ✓ ✓ ✓ Balancing Sphere for Better Control ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BIC Flex 4: Close Shave, Sensitive Skin's Rave
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the hunt for a razor that doesn't irritate my skin but still gives me a close shave, and the BIC Flex 4 Refillable Razors hit nearly every mark. The four blades are superb, gliding over contours without tugging, cutting close enough to make my morning routine a breeze. Sensitive skin? No problem. These razors have been kind to mine, with fewer nicks and bumps than I'm used to.The handle is ergonomic, making it easy to keep a firm grip even in the wet conditions of the shower. The blades last longer than expected, too, which is a wallet-friendly bonus.Now, for the minor concern: while the blades themselves are stellar, the mechanism to attach them to the handle feels a bit flimsy. I'm always extra careful when changing blades, as it seems like it could break with too much pressure.All in all, for those looking to marry quality with cost-effectiveness, the BIC Flex 4 Razors are a solid choice. Just handle with care when it's time for a new blade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best razor I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: I've been having a hard time finding a razor i can use that will do the job quickly and without going over my face multiple times. It may be age related as my face changes the older I get (67).This razor is the best I found and added bonus was I got 16 shaves until I had to change out blades.As long as they keep making them I will keep using. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good alternative disposable razors
reviews.reviewText: I usually get the regular flex 4 where you just get 3 razors with handles. I got this one as it was a good deal. They're about the same as the others, but maybe a little sharper on my skin so I nick myself some times. Otherwise I like it, nice close shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same as ones I have always used
reviews.reviewText: These were a little less expensive than at local stores and it's the ones I have used for a long time. Same smooth shave as I get from the same item from the stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly for me and I'm a woman.
reviews.reviewText: I love these, I always use men razors.. Especially the sensitive kind and these bic ones I've had no problem with. No razor burn, no bumps and no next day itching because of the razor burns. I highly recommend it for women. Not sure about men, sorry guys 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: New item, enclosed in box but was missing the handle. It has all 8 blades but missing the handle. Wasn’t a huge issue cause I just needed more blades but was missing a part described by content in a sealed box. 3 stars for missing an important part as described (though didn’t affect me personally)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Gillette
reviews.reviewText: At a mere fraction of the cost of Gillette, these bic razors are superb. I have tried several inexpensive brands, and I like these the best. I am personally offended by Gillette advertising, and was pleasantly surprised to find these bic razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean shave at a good price
reviews.reviewText: Provides a clean shave at an economical price. Comes with eight cartridges which is a great value.

It was blind purchase at first but when I start trying, oh my god I couldn't believe how sharp and smooth they do the job , value for money and you can keep the handle and buy Spurs blade again, so is not one of those useless disposable razors, I fully recommend this and I will buy again
Já era meu conhecido mas depois de um tempo o mercado brasileiro parou de produzir. Graças à Amazon podemos novamente contar com esse fantástico instrumento agora de forma importada.
My husband says they’re greeeaaat. Good clean shave.
O melhor aparelho de barbear descartável que já usei. Contra, só o valor que deveria ser mais acessível.
